entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , New Glasgow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Caribou Point 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: NNE 33 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
